english.segment1: Under the floor between me and the door. There's a presence I cannot deny. It's under the car between me and the stars. I see glory filling up the sky
english.segment2: And I'm certain that He hears me. He listens even as I sing my song. I'm emphatic that He's near me. And I can see His touch in everything here
english.segment3: Deep is the soul, is the space I control. Is the one thing I can call as mine. Deeper the cold when He's far from my soul. I surrender all of me inside
english.segment4: And I'm certain that He hears me. He listens even as I sing my song. I'm emphatic that He's near me. I can see His touch in everything here. In everything here
english.segment5: And I'm certain that He hears me. He listens even as I sing my song. I'm emphatic that He's near me. And I can see His touch in everything here. In everything here. In everything here
